name: Shadow Gunner
description:
the game is going about a shadow interupted in his sleep by slimy things. he's so furious that he is going to eliminate them all.

Less is More theme: after every level you need to make a choise out of four upgrades. but with every upgrade there is a degrade. like more hp but less speed.

controls W-A-S-D and left mouse button.

made by Mister Px for the BTP game jame #3
